headline: International Business Machines (IBM) “is Absolutely Terrific,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 11 Stocks Jim Cramer Shared His Insights On. International Business Machines Corporation (NYSE:IBM) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed. International Business Machines Corporation (NYSE:IBM) is one of Cramer’s favorite stocks in the technology space.
